data.eml:eml: Redescription of Parotocinclus bahiensis (Miranda-Ribeiro, 1918) (Pisces, Ostariophysi, Loricariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Britski, Heraldo A., Garavello, Julio Cesar (2009): Redescription of Parotocinclus bahiensis (Miranda-Ribeiro, 1918) (Pisces, Ostariophysi, Loricariidae). Zootaxa 2143: 59-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188595
